transit: Des arrêts de bus et de tramway sont situés à deux pas. Comptant pas moins de 8 hôtel sur king david street Cette rue est très fréquenté par les taxis à toute heure.

reviews.comments:
This was a difficult review for me to write since I've stayed at several air bnbs and always had a pleasant experience and never any issues in communicating with the hosts. Not so in this case and ill explain why below.

Straight up, due to a miscommunication, a text sent to me after I booked, I misunderstood what the host was saying and thought she could not host me. (I think she uses (Hidden by Airbnb) translate) I was nervous I wouldn't have a place to stay and booked another location. The reason I did that is because I had not heard back on my request to clarify what she said and getting to israel from the US was so hard because of corona and I had just quarantined for 14 days at a relative all in preparation to see my son who is a lone soldier in the IDF and I hadn't seen him in over a year. I was in a desperate situation and simply didn't understand her. I thought a reasonable minded host would have some consideration. She did not. When she did respond and said it was fine to stay by her I explained that I already booked another place and didn't know what to do. What ensued after was ridiculous. Hours and hours (I'm not exaggerating) of back and forth communication (including talking to air bnb who said they could do nothing unless she allowed) she refused to budge on canceling the stay unless i was willing to cancel on my end and pay $70 in fees. No thanks. So finally I had to message the second place I booked (who had been so so nice thats why I was hesitant) and explain the situation. Right away they refunded in full my stay there as they understood that I had no choice but to stay here. Ironically the second place was not in such a good location altho the price was around the same but I preferred to stay there just by the tone of their messages vs what I (Email hidden by Airbnb) plete lack of regard and caring....basically saying in so many words they needed the money because of corona.

Once I knew i was going to stay i asked for instructions which were sent to me in Hebrew. (By the way at this point she said she would cancel my stay if I wanted (Website hidden by Airbnb) I dont speak Hebrew so i asked for it in English. I did not get a reply.... without those details its very hard to find the place and when you do you have to figure out where to park in the back to bring your luggage upstairs and there are a LOT of stairs. It's a good thing Im reasonably strong otherwise I would have had a really hard time bringing up all our stuff. Anyway an hour later we got a response which were just the codes to get in (which we obviously saw on the page written in Hebrew and numbers we didn't need translated).

I can't say the place itself was bad altho it is not the same place as shown in the picture. The layout is very different. Also the bathroom (not shown at all in the pics) where the toilet is (completely separate from the shower which is opposite the narrow entry hall) is so tiny, it's almost hard to maneuver around. The fridge is tiny as well and there is no oven so to say there is a full kitchen is really a big exaggeration. That being said the rooms were mostly clean although the kitchenette area could have been a little cleaner. There was only one small garbage bag to use the entire weekend. Since communication was so bad I didn't bother messaging.

Overall I would NOT recommend this place as it is overpriced for what you get and the communication is so bad - unless you speak French or Hebrew, and dont mind a ton of stairs to stay in a tiny place. There are so many other options in walking distance to the western wall. Do yourself a favor and find nice people who care about their guests!
Nice cozy and clean apartment. Relaxing and very good showers. No porch though.
Excellent apartment and great location.
A great location with nice amenities and responsive host.

This apartment was perfect for a 2 nights with 3 friends to explore Jerusalem. The location was ideal as it offered a less than 5 minute walk to the Old City with easy walking access to all the bars and restaurants in the city center. The hosts always responded promptly and provided exceptionally detailed directions for self check-in. Overall we really enjoyed our stay here and would recommend to anyone in the future looking for an easy stay in Jerusalem!

Clean and well kept.  Really nice to have a washer especially in a country where self serve laundry mats don't seem to exist.  Great location instructions and very good location; close to everything.  Difficult entrance, however, with many stairs.  When you have so much luggage it's quite exasperating--there is no elevator.  No car parking, should you have a car.  As in most places I stayed in Israel, no washcloth is provided.  You may want to buy some cheap ones if you like having a washcloth.  Only one towel per person is provided; apparently that is standard practice at this location.  Over-all, very nice facility with most all amenities you could need.  No major complaints
the apartment very comfortably housed the two of us for 1 week. we’d stay there again.
Comfortable apartment.

This was the perfect apartment for our visit to Jerusalem to visit our son who is living inside the Old City.  It's about the closest you can get to the Old City and it's well situated to other attractions as well.  The apartment is sparkling clean.  The bathroom is modern and new.  The beds were very comfortable.  The stairs were a bit of a challenge with our luggage but Eli who greeted us assisted going up and we were able to manipulate them down at the end of our stay.  Eli was also very fast to respond and flexible with our check in.  This apartment was a great value and we would definitely stay here again!

Salome’s place is very central, amazing location, easy enough to access even with a stroller. She left a play pen and high chair for the baby which was very sweet. The apartment is very luxurious though small but adorable and perfect for a couple (with a baby). Thank you!
The apartment is very modern, clean and in a great location. I would definitely book this apartment again and I highly recommend it.
reviews.response: thank you jonathan see you soon

reviews.comments: Perfect place great apartment and perfect location

Salomes place was absolutely amazing, it was the most perfect location. The bed was sooo comfortable, the shower was sparkling clean. If I could give her more then 5 stars I would. She went above and beyond for my brother and I, she was extremely helpful, she responded immediately to eveything.. I couldn’t have had a more perfect stay.
reviews.response: thank you for your coming andrea, we would be very happy to welcome you again!

reviews.comments: This apartment is very nice, clean and is perfectly located both for the old and new city. As it is this central the main Street just in front of the apartment can be a bit loud in the early morning. For 4 persons it was just right.
We had a great stay in this appartement. It is situated close to the old city and is close to many good restaurants.

Beautiful apartment near the mamila area
Perfect
Great location
Great location and exceptionally clean apartment. I highly recommend this accommodation.
From the get-go everything was as smooth as silk. The communication was prompt and courteous; The details were precise. The check-in was great. The location is excellent. I will definitely stay again
We had a great time at Salome’s place. It’s really close both to central Jerusalem and the old city.
Location is close to Jaffa Gate, the Markets, Western Wall, the Rock Dome, and the Church.
Perfect location for a small group of people - east to get to from the old city
Great location! Small apartment but clean and perfect for a couple for a short stay.
Brand new flat. Great location!
Very nice Apartment, Great Location and very clean!

Excellent apartment in a superb location -- 10 min walk from Jaffa Gate. The apartment was brand new, sparkly clean, very functional and comfortable. We had everything we needed. Salome even provided a baby cot and high chair. I highly recommend this place.

great place, perfect location.
we will definitely be back soon..
reviews.response: Merci avishai

reviews.comments: L'appartement est très bien situé tout près de l'entrée de la vieille ville et des locations voitures. Un vrai plaisir de déambuler depuis cette adresse, très simple et proche des rues commerçantes. Un café est ouvert même pendant shabbat à deux pas ainsi qu'un supermarché. Très pratique.
Sehr schönes Appartment was auch für 5 Personen vom Platz reicht. Danke für die tolle Kommunikation und gute Ausstattung des Appartments.

L'appartement est bien situé, agréable et propre.
Mais les photos sur le site présentent un autre appartement, plus grand et plus agréable que celui que nous avons eu pour le même prix.
Je regrette qu'il n'y ait pas eu de cafetière et des ingrédients de base (poivre, huile, café instantané, thé...)
Par ailleurs l'appartement est très bruyant.
Enfin, le contact sur place est injoignable pendant shabbat et les fêtes.

Super bien placé à proximité de la vieille ville et de la nouvelle ville, dans un quartier très agréable
très bon accueil et disponibilité en cas de besoin. Moderne, propre
très bonne adresse que je recommande vivement

Logement très propre, très bien équipé (machine à laver, salle de bain moderne, wc séparés ....). Literie de très bonne qualité. Logement près des centres d'intérêt de Jérusalem. Très bien desservi en transports en commun.
Prachtig apartement. Ik verbleef er met mijn 2 dochters. De ruimte was brandschoon en modern ingericht. De locatie was ook geweldig: dichtbij de oude stad.
lindo departamento en una ubicación inmejorable. volveríamos sin duda.

Размещение в этой квартире, к сожалению, разочаровало. Да, расположение там действительно отличное, близко к старому городу, но сами апартаменты крошечные - две маленькие комнатки, в которых очень тесно. На фотографиях всё смотрится интересно, но на самом деле интерьер очень простой. Общение с хозяевами - это вообще отдельная тема. Сразу после подтверждения брони и внесения предоплаты хозяин просто перестал отвечать на вопросы. Мои вопросы на английском языке просто игнорировались, приходилось переводить их на французский. По приезде в квартиру никто не встречает (вход по цифровому коду) и не оставлено никаких инструкций, нет даже пароля от вай-фая! Пришлось тратить деньги, чтобы опять связываться с хозяевами и узнавать пароль от интернета! Информация по парковке автомобиля была дана мне некорректно. Создалось впечатление, что хозяевам просто наплевать на своих клиентов.

nous avons passés un excellent séjour. l'appartement est très propre et  conforme aux photos et descriptif.. les touches de déco sont très agréables. l'emplacement est idéal pour visiterer les lieux phares de Jérusalem. Salomé est une hôte très réactive.  elle a répondu à chacune de nos questions très rapidement.
reviews.response: merci johanna

name: a sweet mountain house
amenities: Essentials - Towels, bed sheets, soap, and toilet paper
Kitchen - Space where guests can cook their own meals

description: The house is located in a quiet place surrounded by greenery and from the terrace there is a breathtaking view. The space is flooded with light. The bedroom is comfortable and cozy and the living room is spacious, with wooden floors and an antique stone wall with arch-shaped windows. You will find a small but comfortable kitchen and on the terrace a comfortable sofa to watch the sunset and enjoy a morning coffee. the house is close by the hiking trails in the forest.The spaceSmoking is only allowed on the terrace :)Guest accessin your stay you will enjoy my intire sweet home where youll have a living room, seperate bedroom, small kitchen and a balcony with a stunning view.Other things to notethe location of the house is 2 minutes away from the bus station and also few minutes away from the beautiful churches of ein karem, the orchids where you can find fruits of the season, speciel trails in the village and of course a perfect balcony in the house to relax with a cup of tea at the end of the day.
interaction: hi! i will be available for you on the phone or in person :)
transit: A few minutes walk from the house there is a bus stop from which you can reach Mount Herzl to the light rail station.

reviews.comments:
This place is located in one of the most beautiful places in Jerusalem with stunning views and lovely host.
The apartment is very cozy and nicely decorated, full of light and the terrace is big and with beautiful mountains views.
You have everything you need for cooking, coffee and the bed is very comfortable.
The neighbors are nice and parking was easy.
You can take the bus on a quick 5 minute ride to connect to the light train and from there it is 15 minutes to the train station, central bus station and 20 minutes to the market and city central.
Merav is super nice and friendly and very welcoming.
Will stay there again for sure.

Do not look further. You have found the perfect place. Merav is a wonderful person and her home is a sanctuary close enough to the city to enjoy all it has to offer. Ein Karem is the   'power spot'  of Jerusalem and  this house has exceptional views, privacy, and a great energy. Merav even left a bottle of wine for me and drove me from the center of town. She is ready to talk about her country and she has led an interesting life. She contributes greatly to the authentic Israel experience  and speaks English beautifully!

We got to the cabin much later then the check in time yet the host was very patient
About it and was there to great us in to her house,
Merav is a very kind spirited host who welcomed us and really made us feel like its are home.
The View was breathtaking
Really felt like an oasis in the middle of the busy Jerusalem
Her cabin has a great Energy,
And the gorgeous stone wall separating the bedroom from living room, you really get to live merav’s life for your stay!
Definitely be back next time we’re in Israel!
Merav thank you so much you really add a lot to our trip❤️

Just WOW. Merav is the best host ever. I arrived late and she was very flexible. When i arrived she greeted me and gave me a tour. She even had fruit for me and everything was set up nicely. The view is spectacular. If you are looking for somewhere quiet & peaceful this is the place for you. The bus stop is right outside (you will need a bus card, easy to get in the store right next to the bus stop) and it wll take you to the train station and that train will take you to where you need to go. Perfectly safe here and so cozy! Right down the street is a lagoon as well. I will deff stay here again

Perfect location
Sweet room
Very sweet host

The place is perfect for couples for romantic getaway. It is very close to the Ein Kerem centre with all its restaurants and churches. Still it is quiet, there are many nature trails around, feels like being in a countryside. The place itself is special and has its own character. It was very clean and Merav was welcoming and helpful and nice to communicate with.

Merav's apartment is very charming, cozy and clean. Located in a quiet street and surrounded by nature, we had an amazing time there. The location is also good, at walking distance from attractions, restaurants and the bus stop to Jerusalem. Merav was available by phone the whole time. Most certainly one of the best places to stay if you want to explore Ein Kerem!

Unpleasant host, who violated our agreement, made me feel uncomfortable and eventually kicked me out early and refused to pay me back. I wouldn't recommend trying your luck with this scammer, not worth your time, money and well-being.

I had a wonderful time at Mera'v apartment - it is super cosy and comfortable, was really a great spot to relax. The kitchen had everything I needed to cook for myself, and had a wonderful time having meals and coffee on the balcony overlooking the Jerusalem mountains area. The apartment is minutes away from several different beautiful nature trails. Merav was a super host - very helpful and communicative with anything I needed (including great tips for walking trails in the area) and very friendly . I highly recommend staying here.
Meirav was outgoing and helpful, and her home is cozy and rustic. We felt at home with ease, and enjoyed the proximity to both nature and the town.

We enjoyed very much our stay at Merav's flat, it has a great and special atmosphere. It is small but has everything you need for a few relaxing days. Merav's tips for visiting in and around Ein Kerem helped a lot to enjoy and get to know this special place. Looking forward to come back.

We enjoyed our stay at Merav’s apartment so much that we returned for a second stay. The space and the environment are exactly as Merav has described and we share wholeheartedly the positive comments from other guests.  It was a lovely, restful place to stay and we enjoyed walking the nearby trails. We used the excellent public transport system with our Rav Kav cards and were able to arrive in central Jerusalem in about 40 minutes.
Merav's home and hospitality were even better than I expected. The view is spectacular, with a perfect "coffee porch" and cute little touches throughout the home. I highly recommend relaxing here!

Merav’s place is a gem! Perfectly located, beautifully decorated and the view is spectacular. Merav was extremely communicative and was flexible about my check in and check out times. I highly recommend it!
We had a lovely stay at Merav's beautiful place. The apartment is very well kept and has a gorgeous view. The kitchen is great for cooking and Merav was a very helpful host :) highly recommended

דירה קסומה עם מרפסת שמשקיפה לנוף פורח ומשגע של יער וטראסות.
השכונה מדהימה ומיוחדת והדירה במיקום מרכזי, נוח, קרובה למסעדות.
המארחת אכפתית, תקשורתית, אדיבה ונעימה.
ממליצים בחום ואהבה ❤️
מירב מקסימה, אפילו השאירה בקבוק יין כי ידעה שאנחנו חוגגים. לצערי רמת התחזוקה של היחידה ירודה יחסית(ברזים,כיורים) מערכת החשמל קופצת לעיתים והציוד מפוזר ברחבי הדירה. בכל זאת המיקום נפלא
היה נפלא! מדויק ונעים

בית נקי,מיקום מדהים ומארחת טובת לב
יכולתי להמשיך לגור שם.

הייתה לנו שהות מדהימה בבית של מירב. המיקום מושלם, המרפסת מרחיבה את הלב, הנוף מדהים, הבית שטוף שמש וסטייל. מירב מקסימה אדיבה ורספונסיבית, גמישה בשעות של צק אין וצק אווט ויש לה המון סבלנות והמון מידע על עין כרם. היה לנו כיף ביותר!

Merev est digne de confiance. Toujours au bon soin pour que le séjour soit agréable.

Encore merci pour la bouteille de vin et les dattes.

Ich habe mich in Meravs geschmack- und fantasievoller Wohnung sehr wohl gefühlt, sie war eine tolle Gastgeberin, auch wenn ich sie gar nicht getroffen habe. Sie hat mir alle nötigen Informationen für den Check-In sehr schnell  und verständlich  gegeben, hatte super Tipps zum Wandern in der Umgebung, in der Wohnung war alles vorhanden ,was man braucht zum Wohnen und Wohlfühlen.  Von der schattigen Nordterrasse hat man einen herrlichen Blick und ist in wenigen Metern im Naturschutzgebiet von En Kerem.
הגענו לסופ"ש בעין כרם, הדירה נעימה ויפהפייה. מיקום נוח בכניסה המערבית לעין כרם. מירב המארחת זמינה לכל שאלה ונתנה אחלה טיפים למקומות שווים בעין כרם.

description: lovely apartment on the 8'th floor with spectacular view to the Israeli parliament , Jerusalem museוm Valley of the Cross.warm decor and kosher kitchen with 2 sinks and all the appliances needed for the stay.
interaction: I love to communicate with guest but I let people choose if they want to have space.I love taking them to a tour to show them around...

reviews.comments: Lovely home and view and great location. Nice building and gracious host.
It was a beautiful apartment with an amazing view! Such a great location in Katamon with easy access to busses around the city. A great place for a family to stay to enjoy Jerusalem!
reviews.response: Thanks for coming to our house.great hosting you

reviews.comments: The apartment was just what we needed for our stay in Israel. The apartment was very comfortable, location great for us, and private parking was an extra benefit.
reviews.response: thanks so much

reviews.comments: We had a great experience with Irit’s apartment. It was clean and truly cozy for a winter weekend. Irit answered quickly and kindly and we will definitely plan to use the place again.

Irit's place is incredibly inviting and grounded, despite the fact you are on the 8th floor!  My partner and I really felt at home here, and were able to easily step into a routine of household life; all that stability gave us a launch pad which made venturing into Jerusalem easy and sustainable.  Irit is a great communicator and prepares you well to be in the place.  There is a view from almost every part of the apartment, and the sunrise is particularly well framed from the bedrooms.  There is a DRYER!!!!  This might not seem like a big deal to you, but my partner and I have been traveling around the Mediterranean for 6 months and this is the first airbnb in which we stayed that has had a dryer, and it was awesome to get that level of dryness in our clothes!  She has set up the kitchen so that it is very easy to maintain its kosher status, so for those who are not used to keeping a kosher kitchen (such as myself) it is no trouble at all, and for those who are, I think you can be guaranteed that it truly is kosher.  I am grateful to Irit and her apartment and certainly recommend it to Jerusalem travelers and saunterers.  Incase you are on the fence about visiting Jerusalem, it is a vibrant city with lots of new life and culture being breathed into it and the old city is a major piece of world heritage that I think everyone should experience.

im so happy to read your revwe
its so generese off you to write

reviews.comments: Expect a great apartment.
Beautiful view. everything you need - groceries just around the corner. Amazing if you are a book lover! They have hundreds of books on fascinating topics. Very cozy.
Irit’s place was great!  Really nice location, the private parking was a plus.  Very big place for Jerusalem.  Thanks again.
The pictures don’t do the place justice. Great, big place and Irit was great helping out with coordinating our arrival. Would definitely recommend!
This was a lovely home in a great location. We would stay here again.

We really enjoyed staying in this clean, spacious, and conveniently located apartment.  Irit was a pleasure to deal with.  The private parking lot was great!  As was the view over the city.  The laundry facilities and well-equipped kosher kitchen with two sets of dishes made our lengthy stay much easier and more pleasant (but be aware that the kitchen has no oven, just a four-burner stovetop and microwave for cooking).  We loved our stay.  Thank you, Irit!
Top floor apartment with a great view!  There's private parking for the building, too.
reviews.response: thanks

reviews.comments: We loved staying here. Very nice neighborhood and not too far from all of the sites. The apartment was very clean and had everything we needed. Would highly recommend!

Both the space and the host (Irit) are A+.  It's a great apartment for many reasons, as the pictures and other reviews attest.  I found Irit to be a pretty perfect host — extremely responsive to any queries I had, while also giving me "plenty of space" such that I felt like the apartment was truly a private retreat.  I'd come back in a heartbeat.

What a fabulous place to stay. Incredible and inspiring views of west Jerusalem-looking over the Knesset and the Israel Museum. Beautiful Jon with amazing living room, everything you could want in a kitchen, and perfectly cooled home via air conditioning. Any question I had was immediately answered and addressed. Lovely neighborhood for walking about. Easy 30-minutes walk to downtown Jerusalem and most other locales.

Our stay at the apartment that we rented from Irit was excellent. We had everything that we needed to be comfortable. All the amenities that we needed were (Website hidden by Airbnb) was indeed a home away from home. The view of Jerusalem from the living rooms sliding glass doors was awesome. All the amenities that we needed were provided. And Irit was most gracious.

Outstanding view great location and beautiful apartment and amazing hospitality
Thank you so much for amazing time !
Beautiful apartment, well appointed, comfortable, clean. Irit is very nice and accommodating . Great location and neighborhood.

Wonderful apartment!  Nice, clean, and lots of room!  Large living area with a wonderful view of Jerusalem. The building has an elevator and parking and is clean and well maintained.  It is a quiet and clean neighborhood.  The hostess was very attentive - even let us know ahead of time what was going on in the city so we wouldn't be caught unaware.   We very much appreciated her checking on us and making sure we had everything we needed.   This was our first time using airbnb and definitely had a great experience.

Very good place. Nice, clean, spacious apartment with 2 bedrooms and large living room with gorgeous view of Knesset and Jerusalem. The building has elevator and attached parking spaces. The neighbourhood is quiet and clean, the building is clean and well maintained. The hostess is nice and responsive

I really appreciated the spaciousness and ease of staying at this Airbnb..you will not be disappointed!.  the apartment is a full 2 bedroom apartment with a full bath and a half bath, kosher kitchen, laundry facilities..and beautifully and comfortably decorated.  Irit left a list of conveniences, like the neighborhood grocery and their delivery service.  Couldn't have been a nicer place to stay for 3 nights, as a family, a couple, or for us, 2 friends.. if you want to be in the middle of nightlife, it is a 20 minute walk, taxi's are easily found.. we will return again if we are to be so lucky as to go to Jerusalem again and we will definitely stay at Irit's place...she was a great and accessible host..

Beautiful home with plenty of room to stretch out.
Couldn't figure out the TV?? but that was probably us :(
Would love to stay here again in the future.

Irit’s Airbnb apartment is in a lovely quiet neighborhood with a beautiful view from the top floor of an 8 story building. She is a wonderful hostess who would check in daily with us to make sure our time in Jerusalem and within the apartment was all as we wanted. Our stay here only added to the enjoyment we experienced during our time in Jerusalem.

Top floor apartment with some lovely views across the modern city. Close to bus stops to go to the Old City (the no’s. 15 and 22), if the 25min walk is not for you. Easy walking to the Theatre and the Jerusalem Symphony complex which is about a 15 min walk away.. The museum of Islamic Art is also close.

Irit was the best host I’ve ever had.  Her response time was incredible. She kindly left us milk and bread because she knew we were arriving early in the morning. A bottle of wine for Shabbat was on the dining table. Plenty of towels, toiletries etc and a fully stocked Kosher kitchen. My only negative was that the one bathroom wasn’t too clean.  I feel bad saying anything negative because Irit was so lovely but I couldn’t leave it out. Perfect location for us but about 30-40 minute walk to Kotel. We walked everywhere and loved it

Irit and Michel were helpful and responsive to our questions, requests, calls for help - before the trip and during our stay.  The apartment was perfect for us and we wouldn't have traded this for another place.  Will surely recommend to friends and fellow travellers to grab this apartment whenever you can.   It is a home away from home, with wonderful hosts who make you feel comfortable and cared for.

We have enjoyed our stay at the appartment. Especially the view from the living room was very stunning!
The appartment and its equipment and facilities have come in years.
The apartment is really cosy and quiet and we enjoyed the lovely neighborhood close to nice cafes, Theatres and museums.

You are getting a super gust!!!you left the house like you never came.
Thanks a lot

reviews.comments: The apartment is quite big. It is very cozy , amazing view and very comfortable! The host was very kind ,helpful , easy to talk, very flexible for check in and check out. The apartment have all type of amenities, laundry, dryer, shampoo, coffee. The building is very clean and quite. Good service on the maintenance of the elevator. The parking lot is a plus!

It was a real pleasure staying at Irit's apartment. Got a very warm welcome when we got in touch with her.  She kindly and patiently told everything we needed and more. Irit was  friendly, I want to thank her for the responses! Highly recommended.

We found the apartment to be comfortable and cozy. The views were fabulous and a lovely breeze  came from the large window overlooking the city. There were plenty of towels and an interesting and extensive library of particular interest to those who can read french and german. location in a clean and quiet neighborhood.
Great location, unique place, wonderful hospitality. I’d love to come again on my next stay in Jerusalem!

This place was the best Airbnb we've ever stayed at. It had absolutely everything: a spacious kitchen with every cooking appliance you can imagine from juicers to toaster, fridge, dishwashing machine. There were even specific utensils to make fondue and Crepes. It basically had anything a foodie, baker or cook would dream of having in their kitchen.
The view from the living room in stunning both by day and by night. The beds were comfortable, and the common area was very stylishly designed.
The neighborhood is very quiet. The place is also very close to public transport, a pharmacy, and a very big and well-supplied supermarket.
If you like reading and your fan of history art or culture, then you'll definitely find some very interesting works in this listings' Library. It was really wonderful and I would love to stay here again.
Very nice apartment with excellent amenities. Very nice responsive hosts. Strong recommendation.

A gem, at a very reasonable price. (We had to leave our home because of a painting job.) It felt like home with the book shelves and the full kitchen. Retro furniture, very comfortable sofas, and from the 8th floor one gets an exceptional view of Jerusalem through the large window in the living room. Parking was fine and we could cook our meals as we do at home (no dishwasher though). The separation of the bedrooms from the living area is helpful (my wife and I have different schedules). Recommended!

Irit was a great host.
Friendly, thoughtful, always there for us.
The place is great, wonderful neighborhood.
It is the third time we rent a place in Israel with Airbnb. All of them were very good, but this one was certainly the best ever.
Definitely would come back.

reviews.comments:
Roni was a very kind & caring host! His home is close to the Old City & the Old Train Station. As for the sleeping space, this was my first stay at a shared space. I had a private room, but shared bathroom, kitchen & commonplace area. As a new experience of sharing space, it all worked out. But I prefer my own space.
Roni was very accommodating to me & my dog. He made us feel very welcomed. His dog Ceasar, is really big & really sweet. This place is best suited for a true dog lover!

Roni was a very hospitable and welcoming host.  He drove us to the beginning of a Bethlehem tour and helped us deal with our tour guide on the phone.  His place was beautiful, and the rooftop view is great.  Roni was clearly passionate about Jerusalem and was a gracious host.  The only downsides were that the location was more remote than we had previously thought, and Roni expressed some troubling anti-Arab sentiments at times.  All in all, it was a nice experience for some weary American backpackers in Jerusalem.
Roni was quite welcoming!  His dog, Ceazer, is so friendly.  The house is beautiful, and the room is just right.

We loved staying with Roni.  His apartment is so charming and eclectic.  He plants flowers everywhere on the front patio and the roof.  The view of old Jerusalem from the roof is postcard-perfect.  It's walking distance to the Old City.  Roni is very warm and friendly.  He clearly enjoys people and is full of ideas of what to do.  And he makes a great Israeli breakfast if you want it.  We will definitely stay with him again when we go back someday.
reviews.response: thanks  for  your  warm words  ..  happy you enjoyed here

reviews.comments:
Roni was amazing.

The view of the Old City was better than advertised. Roni was extremely helpful and hospitable. The place was very clean.

I was extremely satisfied with my experience.

Roni's home is well located for visiting old Jerusalem, Yaffa Street,and the lovely new Railroad Station entertainment area.  The accomodations are comfortable and the garden, rooftop terrace, and Ceasar are great.  Roni drove us to get groceries and to the City of David, and  provided good directions, suggestions, and interesting information about the neighborhood.. Thank you for your help during our short stay in Jerusalem.

reviews.comments: Roni's apartment is a gem.  Could easily sleep 4 with the 2 rooms.  We were only 2 people staying though.  His garden is gorgeous and the view from the roof alone is worth the visit.  We were able to use his kitchen and bathroom without issue.  The bed was comfortable and was a queen sized, uncommon in Israel but welcomed.  Roni is a knowledgable and helpful host.  He gave us a private tour of the forest area of Jerusalem and taught us some israeli songs.  His dog is large, but friendly – staying outside most of the time.  The apartment has ample parking and is a short 12 minute walk to the Jaffa Gate in the old city.  We would recommend Roni's Cozy Garden to everyone.

reviews.comments: Roni's apartment is in a fantastic location...about a 10-15 minute walk to the Old City, near restaurants, and the views of the Old City are really great both during the day and at night.  Roni's a great host...he communicates promptly, responds to questions with thorough answers and is a very generous, hospitable host.  The room is great...bed is very comfortable, there's enough room for storage of clothes and items (I stayed for 4 nights).  Highly recommend staying with Roni...I will the next time I visit Jerusalem.

reviews.comments: I can't say enough about Roni, extremely wonderful host, highly recommend him if you decide to stay at one of his places. I came with my 8 month old son and not only did he allow it but provided us with a baby bed, and went out of his way to make sure we had everything we need. The apartment was also nice, cozy and clean,he provided breakfast and snacks for the apartment, so we really didn't have to go shopping, he also has a magnificent rooftop view of the old city.  Thanks for the wonderful experience. My husband and I hope to come stay again in the future...
Roni's place is clean, comfortable and stylish. The area is easy to get to the old city. Roni was very helpful and gave us a lot of advice and useful tips. We really recommend this house!

Roni is a warm and friendly host who showed hospitality and willingness to share. This was much appreciated for my first trip to Israel. I arrived quite late and was very grateful that Roni waited up for me.
He had the heating in in my room with big soft towels for me to use. I had a really good sleep.
Unfortunately the place could do with decluttering and cleaning out. Lots of empty shampoo bottles and body wash bottles in the bathroom.

reviews.comments:
We stayed with Roni for a few nights and I can highly recommend his place. First, the location. His place is south of Mt Zion, directly across the valley.
The rooftop terrace has a view of the old city, from Mt. Zion to the Temple Mount. It is a 15 minute walk to Jaffa Gate, so it is also a very convenient location. We never needed to use our car while there.

You can cook there, though the working space in the kitchen is small, so you probably won't want to prepare any large feasts. The rooms are comfortable and we slept well. Outside, there is a walled garden with a small terrace. The place is very comfortable.

Roni and his dog live there, so you are staying with him, though you have free run of the downstairs portion of the place. He's easygoing. friendly and knowledgeable. If you dislike dogs, then his place is not for you. His dog is very big, very sociable, very friendly and wants to be petted as much as possible. If you do like dogs, then you'll love his dog.
Great!

Great place to stay. Very nice care.
15 min. Walk to Jaffa Gate.

Every morning he served delicious breakfast and gave us tips for our excursions. The apartment is beautifully decorated and the view of the roof just perfect. We felt very welcome.

Roni is a great kindness. He gave us lots of tips for visiting Jerusalem museums as well as restaurants. We had a great time chatting with him. His house is very well located, you can walk to the old town and there is a mall with restaurants / bars is a 5 minute walk. Its roof top is fantastic, you can see the old Jerusalem. We strongly advise go Roni!

Roni est d'une grande gentillesse. Il nous a donné beaucoup de conseils pour visiter Jérusalem: aussi bien les musées que les restaurants. On a passé de très bons moments à discuter avec lui. Sa maison est très bien située, on peut aller à pied dans la vieille ville et il y a un centre avec restaurants/bars est à 5 minutes à pied. My parents and I really enjoy the stay at Roni's place. The house is a bit old but cozy and warm with many lovely decorations. It is 15 to 20 minutes' walk from Roni's place to the Old City. The huge but cute dog Ceaser is the most docile dog I have ever seen. If you want to have a convenient access to the Old City, Roni's place is one of the best choices.

The room is quite well situated, near the Old Town. The best part of this deal is the host Roni, who was very helpful, although a little boheme, which in practise ment that we got breakfast only one morning out of three. The dog was a loving creature too!

Roni is a great host. He appeared to be very firendly, helpful and supporting. He spend extra time to find us a bus timetable to Dead See, offered us a fruits on our way home and suggested great concert and a nice place to eat. His appartment is very close to the city center, easy communicated with public transport and at the same time in a quiet and safe location. It is decorated in unique style, very clean and cosy and has breathtaking view from the roof-terrace. We spent great time there and strongly reccomed for everyone.

We stayed in Jerusalem at this place for two nights and felt comfortable there. Roni is a real nice guy and his dog Cesar also, but you have to like dogs this size which was no problem for us. Cesar was a very cuddly dog. The apartment is a special but cozy place, the roof top with the view over the old city is gorgeous. Roni recommend us the old train station with live music and restaurants, only a five minute walk away. Roni has a affectionate cultivated garden with many plants. We would recommend this place.

It's a wonderfull location: we were every night on the roof and saw the Old City of Jerusalem. You cannot describe this impression. Breathtaking!! - In 15 - 20 min. you are in the Old City. So we need no car. Roni was very helpfull. Thank you for all informations and the support.

We found Roni to be a very friendly and helpful host. The garden which includes the rooftop is charming and full of character. The atmosphere is very relaxed and guests are welcome to all the amenities.

We would be very happy to stay with Roni again on our next trip to Jerusalem.

Sandi and Offer from Sydney, Australia

name: Jerusalem City View 1611
amenities: Essentials - Towels, bed sheets, soap, and toilet paper
Lock on bedroom door - Private room can be locked for safety and privacy
Dedicated workspace - A desk or table with a chair and space for a laptop.
Kitchen - Space where guests can cook their own meals
Private entrance - Separate street or building entrance
Luggage dropoff allowed - For guests' convenience when they have early arrival or late departure

description: Welcome to Jerusalem City View!My place is close to art and culture, restaurants and dining, great views, and family-friendly activities. You’ll love my place because of the best location in Jerusalem, the room view, the host (Moshe), the people, the neighborhood. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.You are within short walking distance to many interesting sites.We hope to welcome you!The spaceJust in the middle of Jerusalem, in the best location, with the a view to Jerusalem and fair price.Guest accessIn Jerusalem view you get a private room (like a hotel) with 1 double bed, 1 sofa, a kitchen & bathroom.Other things to notePLEASE NOTE THAT LOCAL TAX RULES REQUIRE US TO MAINTAIN PROOF OF FOREIGN RESIDENCY IN ORDER NOT TO CHARGE A 17% VALUE ADDED TAX.
interaction: At the entrance to the building an security officer serves at the entrance 24/7, another person who will show you the room "Moshe" CALL HOUR 08:30AM to 11:30PM remember Israel time —You can always contact Moshe, the supervisor at +972-54-2557373 and you'll get all the help you need, but please call for question, reservation etc. call between 8:30AM to 11:30PMIn emergency and you have a reservation, maybe you plane are delayed etc. Call 24/7.Your host, Moshe, will do the best to take care of you.
transit: You are in the middle of Jerusalem you can walk to the old city "Jaffa Gate" with in 20 minutes. Outside the building you have Ben Yehuda Pedestrian Street.The Light Train is 8 minutes away from us "HaDavidka Light Rail Station" the Light Train can take you to Jerusalem Central Bus station or Mount Herzel where you can walk to Vad Vashem "Holocaust Museum" or down to the old city.If you are coming with a car and need parking we recommend Shomron Parking, 60 NIS Jerusalem, here is a link to the parking via Google maps https://goo.gl/maps/pknNJtAgEWP2 The price for parking 24 hour 7am to 7am is 60,-NIS this price is controlled October 2018 we can’t take responsibility if the price chance, but we will do our best to have the right price for you here.

reviews.comments: Expect comfort sand enjoyment

This place is very centrally located in the Center City section of Jerusalem. It is easy walking distance to the Old City (10-15 minutes) and to the Shuk (< 10 minutes). The bus to the Israel museum is across the street. It is very close to many restaurants.

It can be a little noisy from honking cars at night, although being on the 16th floor helps. It did not keep me from sleeping.

The place is very plain, but very clean. The dedicated bathroom with the shower was more than adequate. The bed is two twins hooked together and can be separated. I would definitely stay here again.

description: Cozy fully furnished house with garden 10mn Jerusalem 40mn Tel Aviv 2 bedrooms, large open living room/kitchen, parking free Maison entièrement meublée avec jardin 10mn Jérusalem 40mn Tel Aviv, 2 chambres, grand séjour/cuisine parking gratuitThe spaceEnglishOur home is located 10 km from Jerusalem right off Route 1 (Tel Aviv-Jerusalem highway), in the suburb of Mevasseret Zion. There are 2 bedrooms with double beds, a spacious kitchen/living room with a couch that sleeps one person. There is a fully equipped bathroom; There is a private garden. There is internet (WIFI access), a flat-screen TV with cable, washing machine and dryer, microwave, cooking stove & oven, CD player, and an electric piano. Free parking space in the street. FrançaisNotre maison est située à 10 km de Jérusalem à cote de la route N1 (Tel Aviv-Jérusalem autoroute), dans la banlieue de Jérusalem à Mevasseret Zion. Il y a 2 chambres avec des lits doubles, une cuisine/salle de séjour avec un canapé où une personne peut y dormir. Il ya une salle de bain entièrement équipée; Il y a un jardin privé.Il y a internet (WIFI), une télévision à écran plat avec les câbles, une machine à laver le linge et un sèche-linge, un micro-onde, une plaque électrique, un lecteur de CD, et un piano électrique. Le stationnement est gratuit dans notre rue.Guest accessEnglishYou have acces to all the part of the house and the gardenwe speak english french and hebrewVous avez accès à toute la maison et à tout le jardinNous parlons le Français, l'Anglais et l'Hébreu
additional_house_rules:
English
No smoking in the house itself; smoking on the patio or in the garden allowed. Pets allowed. Please take good care of our apartment.

Français
Il est interdit de fumer dans la maison elle-même; on peut fumer dans le jardin. Les animaux sont acceptés. Merci de prendre soin de notre maison.
interaction: EnglishA detailed list of recommendations of restaurants, cafes and others attractions in the area will be available.FrançaisUne liste détaillée de restaurants, cafés et autres attractions de la région sera disponible.

Les bus circulent jusqu'à minuit en direction et depuis Jérusalem. Les bus à cote du centre commercial vont en direction de Tel Aviv.

reviews.comments: Frederic and his family are nearby and very accommodating . My kids enjoyed the garden and all the ambiance with that. The location is across the street from a grocery store

Wonderful home with everything our family needed. Loved the outdoor eating area and swing for the kids. The host is exceptional. He is very kind, friendly, and thoughtful, making sure our stay was pleasant. He even supplied games for our family to play and tips about the area and our travel. Sincerely kind host. Would stay here again.

Frederic and his family were incredible hosts, and the apartment also included the outside terrace where we often had breakfast or dinners in the cool Jerusalem air. Frederic made sure that we had food when we checked in that was ready to be cooked including fresh vegetables, sugar for the coffee and he showed us how to use the grill and the other amenities. His family is lovely, and they are the type of people who light up a room when they walk in. They are sincere, honest and people of the heart. We HIGHLY recommend renting from Frederic when staying in Jerusalem. The community is quiet, near two malls and across the street from a synagogue and a block away from grocery store. Everything was as described and over-exceeded our expectations.
Highly recommend! Thank you Fredric for everything!

You will not be disappointed in any way.  Frederic is a great host and far exceeded our expectations.  We stayed for 8 nights and thoroughly enjoyed it.  Upon arrival, we found that he had done some shopping for some food that we could use.  There is also a supermarket that is very near the house and two shopping malls with bigger supermarkets just a short drive away.   Frederic even went with me to the mall and helped me get a SIM card and phone/internet service that I could use for the 2 weeks that we would be in Israel.   At the same mall, he also helped me to get oxygen and a wheelchair for my dad to use at a very low cost.  I loved going jogging some of the mornings in the quiet neighborhood and watching the sunrise over the city of Jerusalem.  We also enjoyed being centrally located not far off of Hwy 1 and able to easily access any point within a short time.  Frederic offered plenty of helpful recommendations.  I will say, you should try the Lebanese Restaurant in Abu Ghosh and the Burgers Bar just down the road.  I'm sure the other recommendations are great as well, but we also did a lot of cooking and eating in.  Everything you'll need is in the kitchen.  There is a new couch in the living room that is very comfortable.   I could go on and on with all the other little things, but I'll try to summarize by saying that I am looking forward to coming back.  I will not look anywhere else, and neither should you.

Fredrick is an amazing host! He took care of everything we needed, paying attention to all the small details and was there whenever we needed. He made our stay extremely pleasant and I highly recommend him!

We enjoyed staying at Frederic's apartment. The place was clean and had everything promised. Fredric and his family were vary nice and welcoming. They made sure that our stay goes smoothly. They even left us some essentials in the fridge, which was very nice. We would be happy to stay here again.

Until this trip I had never heard of airbnb. I dont think I'll ever use a hotel again! Frederic was a most accommodating host. He was very friendly and informative, his son was also a very excellent host! When the washing machine for guests broke he did our laundry in his! Everything that he claimed his unit had was there and available. We would recommend Frederic's unit and use it again ourselves.

Had a great stay!  We were there for almost 2 weeks with jaunts to Eilat and the Dead Sea.  While we were there, they bought a clothes dryer, which was easier than using a dryer rack.  They had some food for us because we got there after the stores closed.  They also brought down a gaming system for my son to play with during our stay.  Apartment was clean and orderly.  I learned the hard way to not carry a knife in Jerusalem.  Fortunately no charges were pressed, but it is a felony that could land you behind bars for up to 5 years.  We loved being so close to a grocery store.  The only drawback, in my opinion, was the lack of good cell service (I had an international calling plan through Verizon), but perhaps other services work better? Not sure.  Great overall experience.

Frederic was an amazing host. The ground-floor apartment was exactly as described, airy and well-appointed, and in a quiet neighborhood. Everything was spotless and comfortable. He and his wife were attentive and helpful from before my arrival through my entire stay. I could not have asked for a better experience.

The location of the apartment within Mevaseret Zion was ideal. A synagogue is across the street, and it is a five minute walk to a shopping center with a couple of restaurants and other businesses. The larger town mall is only a 10 minute walk away, and buses to all points in the country are across from the mall.

Thanks again Fred! Was a great stay! Quiet, clean and comfortable.
Great yard and great yalking to Fred!

it is a good place, would come back again. need to know that this unit is in basement of owners, and it seems that theirs son lives there between rentals. it is not a disadvantage as such, in case of issues, and we did have some, the response can be very fast.
If you want to travel around Jerusalem , location is great.
reviews.response: Thanks Vlad

reviews.comments:
Huge house with all facilities and we enjoyed in the backyard
Highly recommended
reviews.response:
Thank you
It was a pleasure to host you
Fred

reviews.comments: Exellent stay! Frederic is very friendly and hospitable. Kids enjoyed the backyard. Apartment has a great location, we easily reached Jerusalem by a public transport.

Frederic is very friendly and always avalaible. Nice flat .
I highly recommend
Frederic is very frendly host. He waited for us and he helped carry our big luggage from car. He adviced me also to chose the best road when we went out for next destination.
Very comfortable place. Well equipped with all you could wish for including a blender (!).

The apartment is well equipped and has a small garden where our kids liked to seek for easter eggs.  The children felt at home with the toys and we enjoyed cooking and buying food from the super market almost next door. Frederic was very friendly and hospitable to us.
Everything was perfect

Great and comfortable space. Very pleasant host who also offers his garden to you including tasty lemons and clementines. Location was good for families who want a calm place to return to in the evening.

The apartment is good for hosting 4 people. It is quiet and calm place and it is really suitable who wants to travel to Jerusalem/Tel Aviv by car. The host of the apartment is very pleasant and friendly man who is always ready to help. I recommend to select this place to spent here some time.
Frederic is really an amazing host and we really enjoyed his place. Me and my family had a great time in Israel and we strongly recommend the place.

Highly recommended.

Comfortable space. Everything you need. Great location. 100% responsive owner.
Comfortable self contained apartment, quiet, easy access to Jerusalem and not far from an attractive Mall.

We had a great stay at Frederic’s place in Mevaseret. It was cozy and there was ample space for my husband, myself and our son. Frederic was a wonderful host who helped us with anything that we needed. We highly recommend this accommodation.

We spent a week in Jerusalem on a family holiday. Fred is a great host and the place is fantastic to spend time with family near Jerusalem. Fred was prompt with communications, and very considerate of our requirements - we were well looked after. You have the try the oranges from the tree in the backyard!
The host canceled this reservation 11 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

The place is great. We arrive with our 5.5 year old girl and 2 year old boy, they had place to play indoor and in the yard. Fredric was very responsive and helpful. We plan to come back.
It was 10 min drive to Jerusalem
Great location, very close to malls, main road to Jerusalem, very quiet, the house is well equipped, wi-fi and parking is available for free.
Great apartment for a family of 4. The garden is perfect for kids, eating outside and spotting hummingbirds. A great location with a supermarket and bus stop nearby. Thoroughly recommend it.

Frederic is an outstanding host who is thoughtful, accessible and provided everything we needed. He answered questions about local sites and checked in with us about how things were going. We enjoyed the pets who lived upstairs. I would highly recommend Frederic's home!
Frédéric did a wonderful job with the whole process. The place was clean and accommodating and he himself was wonderful, funny and friendly!
reviews.response:
Thanks Naomi and Jean Baptiste
When you are around come at home to say Hello and Mazal Tov congratulation for your wedding.
Regards to your parents and friends

reviews.comments: Frederic was most welcoming. The place is very clean and cosy, fully equipped with all we needed.
Super logement avec toutes les commodités autour et le propriétaire est très sympathique et accueillant.
בעל בית מקסים . מיקום נח למגורים כאשר נתקעים בין דירות לתקופה קצרה.  יש בעיה שאין שולחן לאכול עליו אלא רק שולחן סלון. (בסך הכל בסדר ונח לתקופה קצרה ).

Maison assez spacieuse pour 5 personnes, très agréable, disposant d’une belle terrasse et située à proximité de Jerusalem. Accueil très chaleureux de la part de Frédéric, quelqu’un de disponible et ouvert d’esprit. Un endroit où l’on se sent très bien !
מארח נהדר, דירה נקיה ומסודרת, לא היה חסר כלום.
Ruhig gelegene Unterkunft. Gute Parkmöglichkeit vorm Haus. Von dort aus  lässt sich u.a. die  Altstadt von Jerusalem mit dem Auto gut erreichen.
Отличное место, радушный хозяин Фредерик всегда готов прийти на помощь! Спасибо Фред!!!
accueillant, aimable, réactive, bon séjour,  Je vous recommande.
très bien très spacieux et hote très  attentionné

Situado en una zona residencial tranquila y a pocos minutos de Jerusalém .
Hemos estado muy cómodos en familia.
La atención de Frederic inmejorable, hemos tenido una muy buena comunicación.
¡Muy recomendable!

De ruimte van Frederic is met twee slaapkamers voldoende voor vier personen. Er is echter geen eettafel aanwezig. Eigen maaltijden worden BOS (bord op schoot) maaltijden. Er is maar één electrische kookplaat zodat het koken niet al te uitgebreid kan. De ruimte is qua hygiëne niet super. Supermarkt en bushaltes zijn dicht in de buurt, zodat boodschappen doen geen probleem is (tot 20 uur open) en de aansluiting op OV makkelijk is. Houd er wel rekening mee dat het OV op vrijdag na 14 uur in Jeruzalem plat ligt. Houd er ook rekening mee dat het OV in de spits onregelmatig rijdt. Wie van wandelen houdt, kan hier goed terecht.

Frederic gościł nas 7 dni. Bardzo cieszyliśmy się z możliwości zameldowania właściwie w środku nocy. Frederic jest bardzo serdeczny , gościnny i zainteresowany potrzebami swoich gości.
Kwatera jest położona w bardzo dobrym punkcie, czysta , sympatyczna i zaopatrzona we wszystko co jest potrzebne do pobytu. Frederic zadbał abyśmy mieli po przyjeździe coś do zjedzenia i picia. Pomógł nam również ułożyć plan pobytu sugerując ciekawe miejsca do zobaczenia i wyjaśniająć nam dojazd do nich. Pobyt u Frederica był super, polecam go wszystkim gościom. Dziękujemy Frederic :)

Sijainti hyvä Jerusalemin läheisyydessä. Lähellä myös ostoskeskus.
Asunto oli siisti ja hyvin varusteltu.
reviews.response: Thank you guys and I hope that you had a good visits in Jerusalem.

reviews.comments:
Très sincèrement nous avons passé un excellent séjour. Fred a été d'une grande aide ( provisions dans le frigo à notre arrivée, visite du monastère d'Abu Gosh...).
Très agréable aussi de se retrouver au calme après une journée dans l'agitation des sites historiques visités
Une adresse à retenir et à communiquer.

Замечательное место! Город Мевасерет-Цион очень живописный, чистый и удачно расположен для поездок как в Тель Авив, так и в Иерусалим. В день приезда, была небольшая проблема найти точное расположение дома, точка не корректно отображалась в приложении (Website hidden by Airbnb) По этим координатам точно прибудите к месту назначения (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) Сам дом, комнаты, мебель все соответствует картинкам. Хозяин дома Фред очень приветливый, встретил нас радушно, помог советами, в подарок в холодильнике нас ждали свежие овощи и фрукты, что было очень приятно!

Сад рядом с домом очень красивый, постоянно поют птицы, воздух чудесный. Можно завтракать или обедать за столом на природе. Сам хозяин со своей семьей живет ярусом выше в этом доме. Магазин находится в 2 минут ходьбы от дома.

Мы отдыхали в начале апреля, отопление в это время уже не работает, и хоть на улице днем и тепло, в домике постоянно довольно прохладно, советую брать с собой тапочки и теплую домашнюю одежду.

Всем советуем это место для отдыха, я считаю это намного удачнее чем жить на квартире. Но конечно, это место будет удобным только тем, кто передвигается на машине. Мы остались очень довольны!

O Fred foi um dos melhores anfitriões que nós tivemos em Jerusalém e em Israel como um todo. Super gentil e solícito :)
Ele deixou pães, leite e legumes na cozinha para que quando nós chegássemos nós tivéssemos algo para comer. E nos deu várias dicas da cidade. Nos ajudou muito!
A localização é excelente se você estiver com um carro alugado.
Os quartos são ótimos e a cozinha super equipada! Nós amamos!!!

Очень понравилось. Хозяин Фредерик на самом деле заботливо относится к своим гостям. К нашему приезду оставил нам продукты в холодильнике. Были у нас некоторые проблемы во время отдыха, он оказал существенную поддержку, чтобы нам помочь, всегда был на связи с нами. Место тихое, спокойное и достаточно близко от Иерусалима. Не пожалели, что выбрали именно этот дом.

Casa de 2 habitaciones y salón.
El sitio está apartado de Jerusalén, en una zona residencial muy tranquila, y fácil aparcamiento.
La casa es igual que en las fotos, correcta y limpia.
El dueño es accesible y respondió rápido a las cuestiones que le planteé antes de ir.

Mon séjour chez Terri et Fred dans leur maison à Mevasseret Tsion était génial. Ils nous ont accueillis avec chaleur et sympathie. La maison est très confortable, propre, ordonnée et fonctionnel. À notre arrivée quelques provisions nous attendaient.
La ville de Mevasseret Tsion est très bien située, à 10 mn de Jérusalem et à 40 mn de Tel Aviv, tout en profitant du calme et d'un environnement propice à la découverte des environs.
Pas de problème pour se garer dans la rue et proximité des commerces.
Merci encore à Terri et Fred et lors de notre prochain séjour en Israël nous saurons où se loger.

reviews.comments: Really unique place to stay if you want to stay a little bit off the beaten path in the old city and a great host.
The location is great, in the heart of the old city
The place is very near to Damascus gate, in the old city, very good place to discover Jerusalem. The room is nice, the bathroom very little.

We used Airbnb on numerous occasions over the past couple of years. The host went above and beyond to make us feel at home. We even had an issue on our last day (not related to the room) which she generously offered to help us with. The room itself is located in the old town not far from the Damascus gate, which is great because the shuttle from the border to Jerusalem stops not far on the other side of the gate. The room is located in Churches street however for some reason in (Hidden by Airbnb) maps this street is: Ha-Minzar ha-Ethiopi street. The house number is correct however. The location is also not far from the Church of the Holy Sepulchre. The room itself is a studio. You have all the basic amenities - fridge, microwave, water kettle, sink, plates, cutlery, heater, cooler. There is a comfortable double bed a table with chairs and a closet. The studio is part of an old house with thick walls and a vaulted ceiling so we didn't have to use the heater a lot even on a cold December day. I can imagine it would also be nice and cool in the summer because of this. You will have your own entrance to the room. Due to the thick walls we did however have some issues connecting to the wifi with our phones. I believe it shouldn't be an issue to connect with a laptop. This was not a big issue for us as we were able to connect by stepping out in the hallway. The host informed us this will be taken care of. All in all, my wife and I would highly recommend this place because of the coziness and the location and above all because of the host. As I said, we've met a lot of people through Airbnb but our host in Jerusalem is the best one we've met so far. If I could I would give her 10 stars instead of 5. :-) If you come to Jerusalem, book this studio, you will not regret it! :-) I will also recommend this studio to all my friends/colleagues who decide to travel to Jerusalem.
All good - beautiful location in the middle of old Jerusalem, nice stone walls, room is private and comfortable. The one thing maybe - there is no window, so we were late with waking up ;)
Excelente ubicación a pocos metros de la puerta de Damasco y a la vía dolorosa, acceso fácil a las localidades.

이른 체크인을 요청했고, 너무나 친절하게 잘 수락해주셨습니다. 에어비앤비 체크란에 샴푸가 포함되지 않은 것으로 봤는데, 샴푸와 컨디셔너가 비치되어 있었습니다.
단점이 있다면, 방이 길거리에 붙어 있고 거기서 아이들이 놀면서 오후 늦은 시간까지 쉬지 않고 떠들었습니다. 그것이 예상외로 많이 불편했습니다.

No conocimos a Silvia pero si conocimos a Jiliet y ella fue maravillosa y muy amable, se ganó todo nuestro cariño, de verdad Jiliet es muy atenta, mi esposa se enfermó y nos acompañó y llevo al doctor, de verdad estamos muy contentos de haberle conocido, tiene una familia Adorable, y su hermano igualmente muy amable, yo si regreso a Jerusalén algún día seguro regreso con ellos, saludos queridos amigos, la ubicación de la habitación es excelente
reviews.response:
Thank you so much, you are very kind . Juliette was very moved from the letter your wife left her.
Again we thank you and hope to see you soon

reviews.comments: Un endroit que je conseil car très bien situé au centre historique de Jérusalem et Silvia et très serviable.
reviews.response: Thank you for the feedback

amenities: Essentials - Towels, bed sheets, soap, and toilet paper

description: Under the Olive Tree faces a Jerusalem Stone patio where you can sit and feel the spirit of the old Jerusalem houses.Under the Olive Tree can accommodate 3- 4 people:Master bedroom with double bed , livingroom with sofa A.C, Cable TV, Wi-Fi  Toilet, bathtub and shower + kitchen with toaster oven  burner, pots and dishes.The suit  net size is 42 square meters and it has private entrance, (21 stairs to the street level). Minimum stay 2 nightsThe spaceAvissar House in Yemin Moshe is located in the exclusive neighborhood Yemin Moshe and faces the breathtaking view of the walls of the Old City of Jerusalem, the Valley of Hinom and numerous villages scattered on the hills surrounding Jerusalem.It is a ten to fifteen minute walk from Avissar House to the center of Jerusalem with its shops, restaurants galleries and nightlife. It is a ten to fifteen minute walk from Avissar House to the colorful markets of the Old City and its spiritual centers sacred to Jews, Christians and Moslems. These include The Wailing Wall, Holy Sepulcher, The Dome of the Rock, as well as many other religious and archeological sites. Yossi Avissar, the owner of Avissar House, is a documentary film director and a writer. He will be happy to introduce you to the "real Israel".Avissar House was built in 1892, in Yemin Moshe, one of the first Jewish neighborhoods outside the Old City walls. Between 1949 and 1967 it was near the no-man's land at the heart of a divided Jerusalem. Today this area is renovated and is considered as one of the most exclusive neighborhoods of Jerusalem. Parks and gardens surround the house; the serenity of the neighborhood (no car zone) and its extraordinary beauty are only a few of its advantages.

reviews.comments: I stay here everytime I am in Israel!
Wonderful quaint and ideal location of home. Has great character and owner was jovial and very welcoming. Suitable for 2 adults and 2 young children.

name: Tzefania apartments (303)
amenities: Essentials - Towels, bed sheets, soap, and toilet paper
Dedicated workspace - A desk or table with a chair and space for a laptop.
Kitchen - Space where guests can cook their own meals
Luggage dropoff allowed - For guests' convenience when they have early arrival or late departure
Long term stays allowed - Allow stay for 28 days or more
description: Welcome to Tzefania Apartments, a long-standing establishment of Jerusalem. Founded as early as 1947, Tzefania Apartments have been run by three consecutive generations of our family. As a result, the hospitality experience we offer is unlike anything you know. We invite you to relish our history, photos, and most importantly, the authentic Jerusalem.The spaceOur apartments are simple & clean, recently renovated, and offer good value for your money. Our cleaning services are offered every 3 days during your stay (free of additional charge). We want to offer an experience and depth to your visit in Jerusalem that will stay with you for a long time. In addition, the Tzefania apartments are also welcome Sabbath-keepers, and therefore all the apartments including kosher dishes, a special electric kettle for Shabbat, hot water for the shower with Shabbat clock, electric Shabbat lamp, plastic plates and plastic cups. All to make you feel comfortable.Check in time: If you land in Israel late at night, you do not have to worry about. Our apartments are arranged free entry without any help, using a special code, so you are not dependent on us.Our Building: The pictures speak for themselves. Art objects from Israeli and Jewish history are hung throughout the building, and you can be impressed and learn from the great collection. reviews.comments:
Terrific experience at Asaf’s place.
Super clean, excellent value, terrific location and Asaf and his staff do beyond their duty to make it a pleasant stay. Would stay there again in a heartbeat!
Thank you, Asaf!
Super appartement bien équipé. Conforme à l’annonce.

reviews.comments: Excellent apartment in central Jerusalem, close to everything, very clean and fully equipped, host is very nice and kind. Thanks!

It is one of the most beautiful houses in Jerusalem and is declared a “preserved building” by the municipal authorities30 rooms and family units. My place is good for couples and solo adventurers.My place is close to a great view, park ,restaurants and dining. 30 minute walk to the old city or a short  5 to 10 minute drive by bus or taxi.The space30 comfortable rooms, all of them are fully air-conditioned, free WiFi and cable T.VIt is a unique, Ottoman style, renovated mansion, with beautifully arched windows.
transit: Free parking on surrounding streets as well as a free parking lot across from the hotel.Bus stops to the old city , center of town, Israel museum and all other parts of town.

חדר קטן ופשוט. מחיר מעולה.
די נקי אבל לא לגמרי.

description: Our place has a stunning view of jerusalem and its surrownding mountains. The apt has 2 bedrooms and one living room. The kitchen is fully equipped and we have ac and floor heating. Wi fi is available for free and theres a cable tv.The spaceSpend you Jerusalem holiday in the perfect place: a new 3 rooms apt. (60 square metters) The apt. is located in the lovely and quiet Holyland neighborhood, overlooking an incredible view of Jerusalem and the mountains surrounding it, and enjoys lot of fresh air. It is a great Viewpoint of the renewed Deer Valley which offers a lovely green spot in the middle of the city. The apt offers not only stunning views, but also easy access from the main Begin Road. It is equipped with a very comfortable bed in both bedrooms, air conditioning, a TV, wireless internet connection, kosher kitchen (with: refrigerator, microwave ,oven, a kettle and dishes). You are more than welcome to drink your morning coffee in the big porch, or swing in the hammock. We supply clean towels and linens, and offer a cleaning service once a week (no extra fee). The location is great for couples and families alike: just 3 minutes from the Malha mall, and 3 minutes from the biblical zoo and from the Deer Valley. The apt. is located on -2 floor. the elevator is available to -1 floor.(one and half floor by stairs)Guest accessOur guests will also have access to a room with a washing machine and a dryer, and the complex has an elevator and the parking is free.

reviews.comments: Lovely apartment. Balcony was really nice.   Would definitely stay again

Une vue panoramique sur l’ensemble de Jérusalem accompagnée de terrasse où passer un très agréable moment en famille avec l’hospitalité du propriétaire
Claude
Très bon service, rien à dire.

In addition, the Tzefania apartments are also welcome Sabbath-keepers, and therefore all the apartments including kosher dishes, a special electric kettle for Shabbat, hot water for the shower with Shabbat clock, electric Shabbat lamp, plastic plates and plastic cups. reviews.comments:
This place was beautiful and comfortable. Clean and great location.
The place had everything.

What a great place! Right in the centre of traditional orthodox Jewish area. Definitely an amazing experience. Mesmerising to see it! Very nice and quite room. Nice and clean and hosts are very friendly and eager to help. Get ready  to cover yourself as there are not a lot of westernisers outfits around;) Highly recommend it!

Asaf è un ottimo host: disponibile, simpatico e gentile. L'appartamento è molto carino e presenta tutti i comfort di cui si possa avere bisogna. Nota positiva per la posizione: è l'unico alloggio presente in Mea Sheraim, abitato da Haredi. Un quartiere autentico, situato a 15 minuti a piedi dalla città vecchia.
C’était vraiment bien ! Super accueil et les hôtes très réactifs. Le quartier est très dépaysant (orthodoxe juif). Une décoration ravissante.
Le quartier est à 10 minutes à pied de Jaffa Road, une rue extrêmement animée.

Propreté irréprochable , serviettes de toilettes changées tous les jours. Arrivée autonome avec le code d'accès. Asaf est très réactif et répond rapidement à toutes les questions. Le quartier est très bien situé à quelques minutes du quartier commerçant de Mea Shearim, bus tout prêt du logement. Il faudra 25 mns ( à pied ou en bus ) pour rejoindre la vielle ville ( porte de Damas). Une petite remarque la chambre était petite, pas la dimension d'un studio comme indiqué sur l'annonce, la terrasse exposée côté rue, bruyante . Par contre un grand frigo, micro-onde, bouilloire électrique, couverts plastic à disposition. Climatisation très appréciée, discrète et bien fonctionnelle.
